snippet: As fighting continues in the rebel-controlled areas of eastern Ukraine, a United Nations report said an average of 13 people were dying every day.
abstract: United Nations reports that fighting between Ukrainian forces and pro-Russian armed groups is claiming average of 13 lives a day and that approach of winter has created life-threatening conditions for civilians in eastern Ukraine.
lead_paragraph: As fighting continues in the rebel-controlled areas of eastern Ukraine, a United Nations report said an average of 13 people were dying every day.

headline.main: Hardships Grow in Ukraine, U.N. Says
headline.print_headline: Hardships Grow in Ukraine, U.N. Says

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
